```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
#times new roman tables
my_ft_theme <- function(ft, ...) {
  # Remove vertical cell padding
  ft <- padding(ft, padding.top = 0, padding.bottom = 0, part = "all")
  
  # Change font to TNR 11
  ft <- font(ft, fontname = "Times New Roman", part = "all")
  ft <- fontsize(ft, part = "all", size = 12)
  ft
}
```

```{r}
headscan_full<-read_excel("C:\\Users\\19177\\OneDrive - Colostate\\Desktop\\Dissertation\\headscan_dissertation\\headscan_full.xlsx")
```

```{r}
#HTML Table format    
#AACrace_sumstats %>% 
  #kbl(caption = "Alare to Alare Contour SumStats by Race/Ethnicity") %>% 
  #kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = TRUE)

```

```{r}
colSums(is.na(headscan_full))
```
```{r}
measureNAprops <- colMeans(is.na(headscan_full))

#HTML Table
#measureNAprops %>% 
  #kbl(caption="proportion of NA values per each measurement and demographic") %>% 
  #kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width = TRUE)

measureNAprops1 <- as.data.frame(measureNAprops)
measureNAprops1 <- rownames_to_column(measureNAprops1, "measure_name")
measureNAprops1 <- measureNAprops1 %>% slice(-c(1, 29:33))

#Size 12 Table TNR
flextable(measureNAprops1) %>%
  my_ft_theme()%>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  set_caption("Proportions of NA values for each Measurement Location") %>% 
  set_header_labels(values = list(measure_name = "Measurement Location",
                                  measureNAprops = "Proportion of NA values"))

```
AA_C 

```{r}
#AA_C race/eth sumstats
AA_Crace_sumstats <- headscan_full %>% 
  group_by(race_eth) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(),
            min = min(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            max = max(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean = mean(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            sd = sd(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            se = sd/sqrt(n),
            percent5th = percentile(AA_C, 0.05, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent25th = percentile(AA_C, 0.25, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent50th = percentile(AA_C, 0.50, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent75th = percentile(AA_C, 0.75, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent95th = percentile(AA_C, 0.95, na.rm=TRUE),
            na = sum(is.na(AA_C))) 

AA_Crace_sumstats <- AA_Crace_sumstats %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 2))


#Size 12 Table TNR
flextable(AA_Crace_sumstats) %>%
  my_ft_theme()%>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  set_caption("Alare to Alare Contour SumStats by Race/Ethnicity") 
#%>% set_header_labels(values = list(AA_C = "Alare/AlareCont"))

#Autofit Width Table TNR
flextable(AA_Crace_sumstats) %>%
  my_ft_theme()%>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  set_caption("Alare to Alare Contour SumStats by Race/Ethnicity") 
  autofit() %>% 
  fit_to_width(7.5) 
#%>% set_header_labels(values = list(AA_C = "Alare/AlareCont"))
```

```{r}
            se = sd/sqrt(n),
```
```{r}
            percent5th = percentile(BiW_C, 0.05, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent25th = percentile(BiW_C, 0.25, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent50th = percentile(BiW_C, 0.50, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent75th = percentile(BiW_C, 0.75, na.rm=TRUE),
            percent95th = percentile(BiW_C, 0.95, na.rm=TRUE),
            na = sum(is.na(BiW_C)))
```

```{r}
BiW_Cage_sumstats <- BiW_Cage_sumstats %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 2))


#Size 12 Table TNR
flextable(BiW_Cage_sumstats) %>%
  my_ft_theme()%>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  set_caption("Bizygomatic Width Contour SumStats by Gender") 
#%>% set_header_labels(values = list(BiW_C = "Alare/AlareCont"))

#Autofit Width Table TNR
flextable(BiW_Cage_sumstats) %>%
  my_ft_theme()%>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  set_caption("Bizygomatic Width Contour SumStats by Gender") 
  autofit() %>% 
  fit_to_width(7.5) 
#%>% set_header_labels(values = list(BiW_C = "Alare/AlareCont"))
```
